about_the_game: Freedom Poopie soundtrack feature almost 30 minutes of music composed exclusively for the game. The music was composed by David Chueca Folch.
detailed_description: Freedom Poopie soundtrack feature almost 30 minutes of music composed exclusively for the game. The music was composed by David Chueca Folch.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 2.4GHZ or AMD Phenom X3 8450 2.1 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 430GT or Radeon HD 5750 and OpenGL 3.2
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Open GL 3.2
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 2.66 GHZ or AMD Phenom II X4 940 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 and OpenGL 4.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 4.0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel Corei5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: graphic card compatible with OpenGL 3.2
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel Corei5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic card compatible with OpenGL 4.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Open GL 4.0

name: Freedom Poopie - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Inter Core Duo E6600 2.4 Ghz or AMD Phenom X3 8450 2.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 430GT or Radeon HD 5750 and Dirextx10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest driver
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, pad controller is supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8/8.1 (32 & 64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 2.66Ghz or AMD Phenom II X4 940 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 and Dirextx11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, pad controller is supported.

short_description: Freedom Poopie soundtrack feature almost 30 minutes of music composed exclusively for the game. The music was composed by David Chueca Folch.
